description: Generate random numbers and recall the last one to test stateful workflows. Accelerate demos and integration tests with simple randomness that persists between calls. Tailor behavior with basic configuration to fit your needs.

apiKey.description: Dummy API key for testing purposes

capabilities.name: get_random_number
capabilities.description: Generate a random number and store it in state

capabilities.name: get_last_random
capabilities.description: Get the last generated random number
